review: Love the Amazon Fire Stick.  Love the Prime Movies that are free with membership.
author: Jane E. Mays

review: Great concept.  Easy to use.  Constant delay in the screen. No other internet items in the house have any issues.  Such poor delays we've stopped using it. If it processed faster it would be great.
author: Andrew

review: Does what it is suppose to do ok.
author: Ronnie Taylor "WebDesigner"

review: No. I'm not too happy with the product.
author: Roxie Deleon

review: Binge watching Orange is the New Black sure made the Fire TV Stick was of the best purchases I've ever made. If I never use it again (I know that I will though) that show alone made my purchase well worth it!!!
author: Joan M.

review: Not enough free movies thru Amazon Prime. I may not renew
author: Marcine McUmber
